protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for short chain fatty acids through a G(i)- protein-mediated inhibition of adenylyl cyclase and elevation of intracellular calcium. The rank order of potency for agonists of this receptor is acetate= propionate = butyrate > pentanoate = formate

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway

reference.reference_text: Sawzdargo M, George SR, Nguyen T, Xu S, Kolakowski LF, O'Dowd BF: A cluster of four novel human G protein-coupled receptor genes occurring in close proximity to CD22 gene on chromosome 19q13.1. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1997 Oct 20;239(2):543-7.
